name: Mocha Blizzard
recipeCategory: easy, ice creams and sorbets, non-alcoholic drinks
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup low-fat milk, or more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the warm coffee with the chocolate syrup and corn syrup. Pour into ice cube tray, and freeze.
Put 1 cup of the frozen coffee, 1/4 cup of the milk and 6 ounces of the ice cubes in a blender. Blend until the mixture is a thick, frothy liquid. Pour into a tall glass. Repeat. Serve immediately.
